p: the complaint named in this foregoing complaint that affiar has signed said foregoing complained on behalf of said Author Hain and now makes this affidavid on behalf of him said Author Hain; than affant has heard said foregoing complaint read. Knows the contents therof and believes the source to be true. Subscirbed and written by Patrick Hains before me this 4th day of October AD 1878 J. M. Hall Notary Public
